Sentencas: Nd0.2Ce0.8O3-delta (NDC) is one of the most common solid electrolyte materials used in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Effects of CoO and Bi2O3 single/dual sintering aids doping on structure and properties of Ce0.8Nd0.2O1.9

Sentencas: However, the densification temperature of NDC electrolyte is above 1400 degrees C.
Titulo: Effects of CoO and Bi2O3 single/dual sintering aids doping on structure and properties of Ce0.8Nd0.2O1.9

Sentencas: In this work, Bi2O3 and CoO sintering aids were individually or synergistically added to Nd0.2Ce0.8O3-delta(NDC) electrolytes through the sol-gel method to lower its sintering temperature.
Titulo: Effects of CoO and Bi2O3 single/dual sintering aids doping on structure and properties of Ce0.8Nd0.2O1.9

Sentencas: Effects of Bi2O3-CoO dual sintering aid on the sintering behavior, phase composition, microstructure, and electrochemical properties of NDC electrolyte were all investigated.
Titulo: Effects of CoO and Bi2O3 single/dual sintering aids doping on structure and properties of Ce0.8Nd0.2O1.9

Sentencas: The data revealed that Bi2O3-CoO dual-sintering aid doped-NDC (labeled as NDC-CB) possessed high density and superior conductivity at low temperatures, better than that of Bi2O3 or CoO single sintering aid.
Titulo: Effects of CoO and Bi2O3 single/dual sintering aids doping on structure and properties of Ce0.8Nd0.2O1.9

Sentencas: NDC electrolyte doped with Bi2O3-CoO dual-sintering aid achieved highest relative density of 95.3% at 1100 degrees C and total conductivity of 5.765 x 10(-2)
Titulo: Effects of CoO and Bi2O3 single/dual sintering aids doping on structure and properties of Ce0.8Nd0.2O1.9
Effects of CoO and Bi2O3 single/dual sintering aids doping on structure and properties of Ce0.8Nd0.2O1.9

Sentencas: C. Furthermore, NDC-CB displayed excellent physical and chemical compatibility with La0.68Sr0.4Co0.8Fe0.2O3-delta (LSCF) cathode and NiO-NDC anode.
Titulo: Effects of CoO and Bi2O3 single/dual sintering aids doping on structure and properties of Ce0.8Nd0.2O1.9

Sentencas: Oxygen reduction reaction at LSCF/NDC-CB interface was improved by about 40% when compared to NDC.
Titulo: Effects of CoO and Bi2O3 single/dual sintering aids doping on structure and properties of Ce0.8Nd0.2O1.9

Sentencas: In sum, Bi2O3-CoO looks promising as dual-sintering additive for lowing sintering temperature and increasing electrical conductivity of NDC.
Titulo: Effects of CoO and Bi2O3 single/dual sintering aids doping on structure and properties of Ce0.8Nd0.2O1.9

Sentencas: Therefore, NDC-CB might be potential electrolyte for future intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells (IT-SOFCs).
Titulo: Effects of CoO and Bi2O3 single/dual sintering aids doping on structure and properties of Ce0.8Nd0.2O1.9
